news.headline: Metformin Shows Promise in New Cancer Study
news.summary: A recent study indicates Metformin may improve survival in colon cancer patients.

news.headline: Clinical Trial Launched for Metformin in Ovarian Cancer
news.summary: Biotech firm announces Phase II trial to test Metformin for ovarian cancer treatment.

publications.title: Metformin inhibits tumor growth via AMPK in colon cancer
publications.summary: Laboratory study shows Metformin significantly slowed colon tumor growth in mice.

publications.title: Effect of Metformin on Chemotherapy Efficacy
publications.summary: Clinical trial data shows added benefit of Metformin with standard chemo in advanced breast cancer.

news.headline: Pfizer Trials Sildenafil for Mountain Climbing
news.summary: Pfizer announces research into use of Viagra to combat altitude sickness.

news.headline: Sildenafil approved for rare pulmonary condition
news.summary: Regulator approves novel indication to relieve high altitude pulmonary edema.

publications.title: Sildenafil improves oxygenation at high altitude
publications.summary: Randomized trial found reduced symptoms in climbers using Sildenafil vs placebo.

publications.title: PDE5 inhibitors and Altitude Hypoxia
publications.summary: Review of evidence for PDE5 inhibitor benefits in hypoxic conditions.

news.headline: New Study on TNF Inhibitors in Lung Fibrosis
news.summary: Researchers are exploring anti-TNF therapies for pulmonary fibrosis in early clinical studies.

publications.title: TNF blockade in pulmonary fibrosis: experimental insights
publications.journal: American Journal of Respiratory and Critical Care Medicine
publications.summary: Review article summarizing preclinical data on TNF inhibition in fibrotic lung models.

news.headline: Fluoxetine Shows New Neurological Benefits in Early Study
news.summary: Preliminary research suggests Fluoxetine may improve cognitive function in early Alzheimer's patients.

publications.title: SSRIs and neuroinflammation: implications for Alzheimer's disease
publications.summary: Review article discussing the potential neuroprotective effects of SSRIs in neurodegenerative conditions.

news.headline: Pembrolizumab Shows Anti-Fibrotic Activity in Mouse Model of NASH
news.summary: Researchers report PD-1 blockade reduced liver fibrosis markers in a preclinical study.

publications.title: Immune checkpoint therapy for liver diseases: new insights
publications.summary: Review article discussing emerging roles of checkpoint inhibitors in liver disease.

news.headline: New Study Links Long-Term PPI Use to Bone Density Changes
news.summary: Observational data show chronic Omeprazole users may have higher fracture risk.

publications.title: Proton pump inhibitors and fracture risk: a clinical review
publications.journal: Journal of Bone and Mineral Research
publications.summary: Review summarizing evidence of bone metabolism changes with chronic PPI therapy.

news.headline: Pilot Study of Rituximab in Parkinson's Shows Early Tolerability
news.summary: Initial small study suggests Rituximab is tolerated but no clear benefit yet in PD.

publications.title: B cells in Parkinson's Disease pathology
publications.summary: Research article exploring the potential role of B-cell depletion in Parkinson's models.

news.headline: Ketamine Eases Neuropathic Pain in Clinical Study
news.summary: Clinical trial reports significant pain reduction in patients treated with low-dose ketamine.

publications.title: Ketamineâ€™s role in chronic pain management
publications.summary: Clinical review on the efficacy of ketamine infusions for refractory pain conditions.

news.headline: Clinical Data on Pioglitazone in Mild AD Shows Mixed Results
news.summary: Recent trial reports showed minor cognitive benefits in early-stage patients using Pioglitazone.

publications.title: PPAR-gamma agonists in Alzheimer's disease
publications.summary: Study exploring how insulin-sensitizing drugs may affect neuroinflammation in AD.

news.headline: Study Finds Ivermectin Inhibits Breast Cancer Cell Growth
news.summary: Laboratory study reports Ivermectin's effect on breast cancer cell apoptosis.

publications.title: Ivermectin as an anticancer agent: mechanisms and perspectives
publications.summary: Review of Ivermectin's potential mechanisms in cancer therapy.
